participant_1.background:
I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials.
i love music of the 1980s , especially the pretenders.
my mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.
i work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.
i do not know if i enjoy programming , or if its my only choice.

participant_2.background:
My comfortable recliner is my most valued material possession because it gives me a place to relax and recharge after a long day of traveling.
I just finished painting my nails.
i work as an accountant.
i am looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
I enjoy playing with my little girl.

content.text: Hey, I'm looking for someone to discuss the latest political thriller with!
Hey, I just finished reading one! Do you have a favorite author?
I like Tom Clancy's books.
I love Tom Clancy too! I just finished reading The Bear and the Dragon.
I haven't read that one yet. What's it about?
It's about a conflict between China and Russia over oil. It's really good!
That sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play with my little girl, read, and travel.
I like to travel too! I just got back from a trip to Europe.
That sounds amazing! Where did you go?
I went to France, Spain, and Italy.
Wow! That must have been amazing.
It was! I loved seeing all the different cultures and trying the local food.
I bet! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should! It's a beautiful place.
Maybe I will someday!
I hope you do!
Thanks
